div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

img.alt: A picture with directions to the app download!

p.a: All schools in HESD will be closed March 16 - June 19 due to the COVID-19/Coronavirus pandemic. Click here for Optional Enrichment Activities for students to work on during school closure.

div.p: Formal Distance Learning begins April 20th.Distance learning is a new adventure for all of us! While we would love everything to go perfectly, we know there will be some...
For increased safety, and to continue to serve our community, beginning Monday, April 20, 2020 we will move to a bi-weekly meal pick up service on Mondays and...
ALL HESD Schools are closed until Monday, May 4, 2020. Please visit the Hueneme Virtual Learning Gym for enrichment activities for your student while schools are...

HESD Virtual Learning Gym - new student workouts and parent coaching for this week:
Science for Kids, PE with Joe, the Chrome Music Lab, and articles for parents of children with special needs. #hesdpride
Familias de HESD: Por favor lea este nuevo mensaje para obtener actualizaciones sobre el aprendizaje a distancia y el servicio de comidas. Gracias. https://5il.co/f7tl
HESD Families: Please read this new message for updates on distance learning and meal service. Thank you. https://5il.co/f7tk

First day after a holiday - It's time to hit the gym - the HESD Virtual Learning Gym! New for this week - CIA Spy Kids (Brain), Koo Koo Kanga Roo Dance Party (Body), and Storyline Online (Being). Remember to ✔️ out our parent coaching section! bit.ly/hesdgym20 #hesdpride

The Hueneme Elementary School District prohibits discrimination, harassment, intimidation, bullying and sexual harassment based on actual or perceived ancestry, age, color, disability, gender, gender identity, gender expression, immigration status, nationality, parental status, pregnancy status, race or ethnicity, religion, sex, sexual orientation, or association with a person or a group with one or more of these actual or perceived characteristics in all educational programs, school related or school sponsored activities, school attendance or employment policies which may have an impact or create a hostile environment at school as required by Title IX of the 1972 Education amendments, Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, the Americans with Disabilities Act, the California Fair Employment and Housing Act, and other applicable laws and regulations. For questions or concerns regarding discrimination, harassment, intimidation, bullying or sexual harassment, please contact the District's Discrimination, Equity, and Title IX Compliance Officer: Raven Aipa, Senior Director Educational Programs Hueneme Elementary School District 205 N. Ventura Road Port Hueneme, CA 93041 (805) 488-3588, Ext. 9260 raipa@hueneme.org

All HESD schools will be closed March 16th - June 19 due to the COVID-19/Coronavirus pandemic. Please visit our Coronavirus news article located on the home page of our district website to see the latest updates, information and food service offerings.
Enrichment Activities for students to work on during school closure can be found here:

p.em: Todas las escuelas de HESD permanecerán cerradas del 16 de marzo al 19 de junio debido a la pandemia de COVID-19/Coronavirus. Por favor visite nuestro artículo de noticias sobre Coronavirus que se encuentra en la página principal del sitio web de nuestro distrito para ver las últimas actualizaciones, información y ofertas de servicios de alimentos.
Las Actividades de Enriquecimiento para que los estudiantes trabajen durante el cierre de escuela se pueden encontrar aquí:
